SEARCH
Package org.nejjari.hanae.gameup.web.rest

Class GameRestController

java.lang.Object
org.nejjari.hanae.gameup.web.SuperRestController<GameDto,GameService>
org.nejjari.hanae.gameup.web.rest.GameRestController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/game") public class GameRestController extends SuperRestController<GameDto,GameService>
REST controller for handling game-related web requests.

  • Method Details

    • distinctSearchByNomOrGenreOrNumEditionOrAuteurOrCategoryTypeOrPublisherName

      @GetMapping(path="/search") public Set<GameDto> distinctSearchByNomOrGenreOrNumEditionOrAuteurOrCategoryTypeOrPublisherName(@RequestParam(value="nom",required=false) String nom, @RequestParam(value="genre",required=false) String genre, @RequestParam(value="numEdition",required=false) String numEdition, @RequestParam(value="auteur",required=false) String auteur, @RequestParam(value="categoryType",required=false) String categoryType, @RequestParam(value="publisherName",required=false) String publisherName)
      Handles GET requests for searching distinct game DTOs by multiple criteria (nom, genre, etc.).
      Parameters:
      nom - The name of the game to search for.
      genre - The genre of the game to filter by.
      numEdition - The edition number of the game to filter by.
      auteur - The author/developer of the game to filter by.
      categoryType - The type/category of the game to filter by.
      publisherName - The publisher name of the game to filter by.
      Returns:
      A set containing distinct GameDto objects matching any of the provided criteria.

    • getRecommandedGameByAI

      @GetMapping(path="/recommendations") public Set<GameDto> getRecommandedGameByAI()
      Returns a set of recommended games based on the AI recommendation algorithm.
      Returns:
      a set of recommended GameDto objects.
